author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup, Wells Fargo, Broadcom, Qualcomm, Amazon, Tesla, Netflix
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Friday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. JPMorgan Chase & Co.—Up 1.7%: JPMorgan said Friday that first-quarter profit rose 35% to a record high as the bank benefited from big trading gains and a windfall from the new tax law. —Up 1.8%:   Russia Funds Draw Money, Despite Sanctions and Syria Next Brexit & Beyond: U.S., France and Britain Unite Around Syria Strike Plans, ECB Worries About Trade and Euro, Goldman Chief Says Brexit Proving Less Drastic Than Expected
